label.description: Metadata tag on an atproto resource (eg, repo or record).

ver.description: The AT Protocol version of the label object.

src.description: DID of the actor who created this label.

uri.description: AT URI of the record, repository (account), or other resource that this label applies to.

cid.description: Optionally, CID specifying the specific version of 'uri' resource this label applies to.

val.description: The short string name of the value or type of this label.

neg.description: If true, this is a negation label, overwriting a previous label.

cts.description: Timestamp when this label was created.

exp.description: Timestamp at which this label expires (no longer applies).

selfLabels.description: Metadata tags on an atproto record, published by the author within the record.

selfLabel.description: Metadata tag on an atproto record, published by the author within the record. Note that schemas should use #selfLabels, not #selfLabel.

val.description: The short string name of the value or type of this label.

labelValueDefinition.description: Declares a label value and its expected interpretations and behaviors.

identifier.description: The value of the label being defined. Must only include lowercase ascii and the '-' character ([a-z-]+).

severity.description: How should a client visually convey this label? 'inform' means neutral and informational; 'alert' means negative and warning; 'none' means show nothing.

blurs.description: What should this label hide in the UI, if applied? 'content' hides all of the target; 'media' hides the images/video/audio; 'none' hides nothing.

defaultSetting.description: The default setting for this label.

adultOnly.description: Does the user need to have adult content enabled in order to configure this label?

labelValueDefinitionStrings.description: Strings which describe the label in the UI, localized into a specific language.

lang.description: The code of the language these strings are written in.

name.description: A short human-readable name for the label.

description.description: A longer description of what the label means and why it might be applied.
